original: intros X r2 r1 l2 l1 H1 H2. apply app_inv_tail in H2. rewrite app_length in H2. rewrite app_length with (l:=l1) in H2. rewrite app_length with (l:=l2) in H1. apply Nat.add_cancel_l with (p:=length l1) in H2. split. - rewrite <- H2. apply app_inj_tail in H2. destruct H2 as [H3 H4]. rewrite H4. apply app_eq_nil in H3. destruct H3 as [H5 H6]. rewrite H5. symmetry. apply app_nil_r. - rewrite H2. reflexivity.
